meta.description: Optimize the number of molars and canines filled to minimize pain killer usage under resin and minimum filling constraints.

sets.name: TEETH_TYPES
sets.description: Types of teeth to fill cavities in.

params.name: pain_killer_requirement
params.description: Pain killer required per tooth type.

params.name: min_molars
params.description: Minimum number of molars to fill.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of teeth to fill.

objective.name: min_total_pain_killer
objective.description: Minimize the total amount of pain killer used.

constraints.name: resin_constraint
constraints.description: Total resin used must not exceed available resin.

constraints.name: min_molars_constraint
constraints.description: At least 45 molars must be filled.

constraints.name: canines_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: At least 60% of the filled cavities must be in canines.
